content.text:
# 49th Academy of Country Music Awards

(5 each)
| most_wins = Miranda Lambert (3)
| network = CBS
| host =
| ratings =
| previous = 48th
| main = ACM
| next = 50th
| image_size = 200
}}
The 49th Academy of Country Music Awards were held on Sunday, April 6, 2014, at the MGM Grand Garden Arena, Las Vegas, Nevada. The ceremony was hosted by Luke Bryan and Blake Shelton.
Winners and nominees
Winners are shown in bold.
{| class="wikitable"
! width="50%" style="background:#EEDD85;" |Entertainer of the Year
! width="50%" style="background:#EEDD85;" |Album of the Year
|-
| valign="top" |

** Luke Bryan
** Miranda Lambert
** Blake Shelton
** Taylor Swift
| valign="top" |
*Same Trailer Different Park — Kacey Musgraves
**Based on a True Story... — Blake Shelton
**Crash My Party — Luke Bryan
**''Here's To The Good Times — Florida Georgia Line
**Two Lanes Of Freedom — Tim McGraw
|-
